languages.text: "Ай'элетра уже давно ведет меня тернистыми тропами. И ты, элантах, лишь очередн{mf|ой|ая} попутчи{mf|к|ца} на одной из них. Спроси хоть сотню раз, выберу ли я спасти моих братьев или ступать подле мон-кай — мой ответ останется неизменным. Прощай, чужак из тьмы меж звезд. На этом... наши пути расходятся".

traits.locale_text: "Ай'элетра уже давно ведет меня тернистыми тропами. И ты, элантах, лишь очередн{mf|ой|ая} попутчи{mf|к|ца} на одной из них. Спроси хоть сотню раз, выберу ли я спасти моих братьев или ступать подле мон-кай — мой ответ останется неизменным. Прощай, чужак из тьмы меж звезд. На этом... наши пути расходятся".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ai'elethra has long since guided me down the roads of thorns. And you, elantach, are just another fleeting companion along one of them. Ask me a hundred times if I would choose to save my kin or walk at a mon-keigh's side, and my answer will not change once. Farewell, stranger from the darkness amid the stars. Here our Paths diverge."
languages.original_text: "Ай'элетра уже давно ведет меня тернистыми тропами. И ты, элантах, лишь очередн{mf|ой|ая} попутчи{mf|к|ца} на одной из них. Спроси хоть сотню раз, выберу ли я спасти моих братьев или ступать подле мон-кай — мой ответ останется неизменным. Прощай, чужак из тьмы меж звезд. На этом... наши пути расходятся".

traits.locale_text: "Ai'elethra has long since guided me down roads of thorns. And you, elantach, are just another fleeting companion along one of them. Ask me a hundred times if I would choose to save my kin or walk at a mon-keigh's side, and my answer will not change once. Farewell, stranger from the darkness amidst the stars. This is the parting of our ways."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Ai'elethra has long since guided me down the roads of thorns. And you, elantach, are just another fleeting companion along one of them. Ask me a hundred times if I would choose to save my kin or walk at a mon-keigh's side, and my answer will not change once. Farewell, stranger from the darkness amid the stars. Here our Paths diverge."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Voilà bien longtemps que je suis la voie que m'a tracée Ai'elethra sur les chemins de traverse. Et vous, elantach, n'êtes qu'{mf|un compagnon|une compagne} éphémère le long de l'un d'entre eux. Demandez-moi cent fois de choisir entre sauver les miens ou marcher aux côtés d'{mf|un|une} mon-keigh, ma réponse sera toujours la même. Adieu, {mf|étranger|étrangère} parmi les astres. C'est ici que nos Voies se séparent. »
languages.original_text: "Ai'elethra has long since guided me down the roads of thorns. And you, elantach, are just another fleeting companion along one of them. Ask me a hundred times if I would choose to save my kin or walk at a mon-keigh's side, and my answer will not change once. Farewell, stranger from the darkness amid the stars. Here our Paths diverge."

traits.locale_text: « Voilà bien longtemps que je suis la voie que m'a tracée Ai'elethra sur les chemins de traverse. Et vous, elantach, n'êtes qu'{mf|un compagnon|une compagne} éphémère le long de l'un d'entre eux. Demandez-moi cent fois de choisir entre sauver les miens ou marcher aux côtés d'{mf|un|une} mon-keigh, ma réponse sera toujours la même. Adieu, {mf|étranger|étrangère} parmi les astres. C'est ici que nos chemins se séparent. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我的道途准则早已指引我踏过无数条荆棘之路。至于你，外界人，你不过是其中一条道路上转瞬即逝的同伴。如果你问我，我是会选择拯救我自己的族人，还是会选择站在猴子身边，哪怕你问上我一百次，我的答案也一次都不会改变。永别了，来自群星与黑暗之中的陌生人，我们就此分道扬镳吧。”
languages.original_text: "Ai'elethra has long since guided me down the roads of thorns. And you, elantach, are just another fleeting companion along one of them. Ask me a hundred times if I would choose to save my kin or walk at a mon-keigh's side, and my answer will not change once. Farewell, stranger from the darkness amid the stars. Here our Paths diverge."

traits.locale_text: “我的道途准则早已指引我踏过无数条荆棘之路。至于你，外界人，你不过是其中一条道路上转瞬即逝的同伴。如果你问我，我是会选择拯救我自己的族人，还是会选择站在猴子身边，哪怕你问上我一百次，我的答案也一次都不会改变。永别了，来自群星与黑暗之中的陌生人，我们就此分道扬镳吧。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「アイ＝エレトラは長い間、私をいくつもの茨の道に導いてくれた。そしてエランタよ。あなたもまた、その茨の道を行く中での束の間の連れに過ぎない。我が血族を救うか、それともモン＝ケイに同道するかを何度問われても、私の答えは一度たりとも変わらないだろう。さらばだ、星々の中の闇から来たよそ者よ。ここで道を分かつとしよう」
languages.original_text: "Ai'elethra has long since guided me down the roads of thorns. And you, elantach, are just another fleeting companion along one of them. Ask me a hundred times if I would choose to save my kin or walk at a mon-keigh's side, and my answer will not change once. Farewell, stranger from the darkness amid the stars. Here our Paths diverge."

traits.locale_text: 「アイ＝エレトラは長い間、私をいくつもの茨の道に導いてくれた。そしてエランタよ。あなたもまた、その茨の道を行く中での束の間の連れに過ぎない。我が血族を救うか、それともモン＝ケイに同道するかを何度問われても、私の答えは一度たりとも変わらないだろう。さらばだ、星々の中の闇から来たよそ者よ。ここで道を分かつとしよう」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ai'elethra führt mich schon lange auf meinem dornigen Weg. Und Ihr, Elantach, seid nur {mf|ein weiterer flüchtiger Gefährte|eine weitere flüchtige Gefährtin} auf einem dieser Wege. Ihr könntet noch so oft fragen, ob ich lieber mein Volk retten oder an der Seite {mf|eines|einer} Chem-Pan-Sey bleiben würde – meine Antwort wäre immer dieselbe. Lebt wohl, {mf|Fremder|Fremde} aus der Finsternis der Sterne. Hier trennen sich unsere Pfade."
languages.original_text: "Ai'elethra has long since guided me down the roads of thorns. And you, elantach, are just another fleeting companion along one of them. Ask me a hundred times if I would choose to save my kin or walk at a mon-keigh's side, and my answer will not change once. Farewell, stranger from the darkness amid the stars. Here our Paths diverge."

traits.locale_text: "Ai'elethra führt mich schon lange auf meinem dornigen Weg. Und Ihr, Elantach, seid nur {mf|ein weiterer flüchtiger Gefährte|eine weitere flüchtige Gefährtin} auf einem dieser Wege. Ihr könntet noch so oft fragen, ob ich lieber mein Volk retten oder an der Seite {mf|eines|einer} Chem-Pan-Sey bleiben würde – meine Antwort wäre immer dieselbe. Lebt wohl, {mf|Fremder|Fremde} aus der Finsternis der Sterne. Hier trennen sich unsere Wege."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Ai'elethra lleva mucho tiempo guiándome por senderos espinosos. Y tú, elantach, no has sido más que {mf|otro compañero|otra compañera} durante un breve trecho. Puedes preguntarme cien veces si prefiero salvar a los míos o caminar junto a {mf|un|una} mon-keigh, y siempre obtendrás la misma respuesta. Adiós, {mf|forastero|forastera} de la oscuridad interestelar. Aquí se separan nuestras sendas».
languages.original_text: "Ai'elethra has long since guided me down the roads of thorns. And you, elantach, are just another fleeting companion along one of them. Ask me a hundred times if I would choose to save my kin or walk at a mon-keigh's side, and my answer will not change once. Farewell, stranger from the darkness amid the stars. Here our Paths diverge."

traits.locale_text: «Ai'elethra lleva mucho tiempo guiándome por senderos espinosos. Y tú, elantach, no has sido más que {mf|otro compañero|otra compañera} durante un breve trecho. Puedes preguntarme cien veces si prefiero salvar a los míos o caminar junto a {mf|un|una} mon-keigh, y siempre obtendrás la misma respuesta. Adiós, {mf|forastero|forastera} de la oscuridad interestelar. Aquí se separan nuestros caminos».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ai'elethra, dikenli yollarda bana çok uzun süredir rehberlik ediyor. Sen ise elantach, yalnızca birçok geçici yoldaşımdan birisin. Bana kendi soyumu kurtarmayı mı yoksa bir mon-keigh'in yanında yürümeyi mi tercih edeceğimi yüz kere de sorsan yanıtım bir kez bile değişmez. Hoşça kal yıldızların arasındaki karanlıktan gelen yabancı. Yollarımız burada ayrılıyor."
languages.original_text: "Ai'elethra has long since guided me down the roads of thorns. And you, elantach, are just another fleeting companion along one of them. Ask me a hundred times if I would choose to save my kin or walk at a mon-keigh's side, and my answer will not change once. Farewell, stranger from the darkness amid the stars. Here our Paths diverge."

traits.locale_text: "Ai'elethra dikenlerle kaplı yollarda bana çok uzun süredir rehberlik ediyor. Sen ise elantach, birçok geçici yoldaşımdan yalnızca birisin. Bana kendi soyumu kurtarmayı mı yoksa bir mon-keigh'in yanında yürümeyi mi tercih edeceğimi yüz kere de sorsan, yanıtım bir kez bile değişmez. Hoşça kal yıldızların arasındaki karanlıktan gelen yabancı. Yollarımız burada ayrılıyor."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
